feed.title: PeaNUT Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for PeaNUT: v2.5.0
entry.content:
NEW

  • Swagger api docs are now available at /api/docs.

entry.title: New release for PeaNUT: v2.5.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • New Crowdin translations by GitHub Action by @github-actions in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/34
  • Bump ScribeMD/docker-cache from 0.3.7 to 0.4.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/43
  • Bump follow-redirects from 1.15.5 to 1.15.6 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/42
  • Bump undici from 5.28.2 to 5.28.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/38
  • Bump pnpm/action-setup from 2 to 3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/37
  • Bump actions/setup-node from 4.0.1 to 4.0.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/36
  • Add HOSTNAME env variable by @aazam476 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/44
  • Bump ScribeMD/docker-cache from 0.4.0 to 0.5.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/45
  • Bump undici from 5.28.3 to 5.28.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/46
  • Bump next from 14.1.0 to 14.1.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/49

New Contributors

  • @aazam476 made their first contribution in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/44

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/compare/v2.5.0...v2.5.1

entry.title: New release for PeaNUT: v2.5.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixed a bug where nothing was shown when the ups driver did not report model and manufacturer.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/compare/v2.5.1...v2.5.2

entry.title: New release for PeaNUT: v2.6.0
entry.content:
Breaking Changes

V1 API now attempts to resolve the proper type for each parameter. Some strings may now be numbers. This will help in porting data to InfluxDB

What's Changed

  • New Crowdin translations by GitHub Action by @github-actions in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/53
  • Bump pnpm/action-setup from 3 to 4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/51
  • add copy command to package.json - fixes #35 by @vhsdream in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/55
  • Bump crowdin/github-action from 1 to 2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/54
  • Bump braces from 3.0.2 to 3.0.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/59
  • Bump ws from 7.5.9 to 7.5.10 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/58
  • Add support for Grafana & InfluxDB by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/61

New Contributors

  • @vhsdream made their first contribution in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/55

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/compare/v2.5.2...v2.6.0

entry.title: New release for PeaNUT: v2.6.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Bump actions/setup-node from 4.0.2 to 4.0.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/62
  • Fix for UPS devices without serial numbers by @Brandawg93 in 03d123641cdabbe035d604980d547ccf7a4b9693

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/compare/v2.6.0...v2.6.1
